author: danderson
msg: Stop overwriting our dependencies' autoconf stuff when we run
autogen.sh.
* autogen.sh: Remove execution of apr*'s buildconf scripts.  Fix
reference to Apache 2.0, which should be 2.x.

author: maxb
msg: * notes/releases.txt: Add a note explaining that this document is deprecated
and being replaced by www/release-process.html.
Delete sections which have already been subsumed in full.

author: maxb
msg: * www/release-process.html: Fix terminology "micro-version" -> "patch-version".
Emphasise that release branches are for series, not for A.B.0 releases.
Add a warning sentence about autoconf, etc., copied from notes/releases.txt.

author: maxb
msg: * dist.sh: Remove substitution for obsolete SVN_VER_MICRO - it was ineffective
in any case, since the regexp no longer matched.

author: maxb
msg: * dist.sh:
Make -pr option mandatory, since its default setting is nonsense for our
1.x release process.
Update usage comments, which were out of date.
Clarify the difference between -r REVISION and -rs REVISION-SVN, which was
rather obscure.
Add an echo mentioning svn_version.h.dist, a feature of dist.sh that I'd
managed to be completely unaware of.
Mention REPOS_PATH in the progress output.
